plot: A professional basketball player feels marginalized after spending most of his time on the bench. Based on former NBA player Paul Shirley's blog "My So-Called NBA Career."
title: The 12th Man
plot_es: A professional basketball player feels marginalized after spending most of his time on the bench. Based on former NBA player Paul Shirley's blog "My So-Called NBA Career."
plot_en: A professional basketball player feels marginalized after spending most of his time on the bench. Based on former NBA player Paul Shirley's blog "My So-Called NBA Career."
